description:
Gallagher is pleased to partner with PRIMED Medical Products Inc. in the search for their Vice President, Technology role.






The Organization


PRIMED Medical Products Inc. (“PRIMED”) is a leading Canadian medical product provider to hospitals, clinics and long-term care facilities. PRIMED also offers branded, co-branded and private label products and services to their customers and global partners. The company has its corporate head office in Edmonton, Alberta, four wholly owned manufacturing facilities in Asia, and their newest facility in Cambridge, Ontario. PRIMED Cambridge joins the organization as the domestic production hub and Centre of Excellence for North American personal protective equipment production.




PRIMED is proud to be an ISO 13485:2016 registered company and recognized as both a Deloitte’s Best Managed Companies and Alberta’s Top Employer four years running.




Mission: To protect people from harmful substances and infectious diseases




Core Values: Collaboration, Respect, Agility, Fearlessness, Trustworthiness




PRIMED teams are made of passionate, accomplished, and creative people. Their culture is collective because they motivate and trust each other. Team members are encouraged to challenge the status quo, are tenacious, resourceful and thrive in a fast-paced and supportive environment.




For more information on PRIMED, please visit: https://primed.com/

 





The Opportunity



Reports to: 
Chief Executive Officer


Direct Reports: 
6: Director Information Systems; Senior Business Systems Analyst & BI (x2); Desktop Support Analyst; Software Developer & Business Systems Analyst; Software Developer Co-op Student


Location:
 Edmonton, AB




 


Mandate


The Vice President, Technology will integrate current and emerging technology into PRIMED’s strategy to add to their services and overall value proposition. By transforming PRIMED’s use of information, the Vice President, Technology will improve their ability to provide customers with world-class capabilities. The Vice President, Technology is responsible for driving continuous improvement through technological innovation. The successful candidate will lead strategic and tactical planning as well as identifying, selecting, and deploying the appropriate technology resources in support of organizational goals and objectives. As a member of the leadership team, the Vice President, Technology will drive continuous improvement to ensure PRIMED remains an employer of choice.

 





Key Accountabilities


The position will include the following responsibilities:


Strategic Leadership



Develop and deliver PRIMED’s technology strategy;

Develop the information architecture and framework that will enable effective decision making;

Maintain exceptional collaborative relationships with peers to ensure PRIMED’s technology strategy enhances all areas of PRIMED’s operations;

Identify opportunities to innovate in the delivery of services, development of information capabilities, and improve operational performance;

Stay apprised of industry best practices; anticipating and planning for the future needs of the organization; and

Identify and implement technology solutions to leverage data and provide industry leading customer service.


 





Operational Leadership



Lead the delivery of PRIMED’s technology roadmap;

Identify emerging information technology solutions that provide value for all business lines;

Effectively manage projects and change management initiatives;

Develop and establish operating guidelines and policies for all technologies;

Oversee the development and project management of new applications and tools for existing systems and processes;

Establish key metrics to measure success of new projects and services;

Ensures security of the information systems, backups and disaster recovery procedures and plans; and

Oversee and ensure all data is accurate, auditable, and is delivered timely.


 





People Leadership



Foster a culture of information and data integrity that prioritizes timely, accurate and auditable information;

Establish a culture of high standards and continuous improvement in technology and services provided by the team;

Coach, lead, and manage a team of high performing developers and analysts;

Coach, mentor, and guide decision making processes within the technology group;

Maintain exceptional relationships across the organization to identify needs and areas for improvement; and

Manage external contractor, service provider and vendor relationships.


 





Attractions



Ability to work collaboratively with colleagues across the organization to create a results driven, team-orientated environment;

PRIMED is recognized as one of Deloitte’s Best Managed Companies and an Alberta Top Employer (2018-2022); and

Lead the technology strategy of an Edmonton headquartered global manufacturing and supplier specializing in high-quality medical personal protective apparel.


 





First Year Deliverables / Measures of Success


Success in the first year will be determined by the candidate’s ability to:


Develop a nuanced understanding of PRIMED’s business model, customers, value proposition, and products;

Assess and analyze PRIMED’s existing technology infrastructure to effectively lead the inception, development, calibration and execution of a multi-year technology roadmap;

In alignment with PRIMED’s five-year strategy, develop long term plan to deliver an ERP solution;

Ensure all data produced is timely, accurate, and auditable;

Live and demonstrate PRIMED’s core values of collaboration, respect, agility, fearlessness and trustworthiness; and

Cultivate trust and respect through building collaborative relationships across the organization.


 





Candidate Profile


The successful candidate will have the following:


Education:



Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or a related field; and

Demonstrated commitment to ongoing professional development.


 





Experience:



10+ years of relevant work experience; with 5+ years’ experience managing projects;

Track record of success in creating and executing technology roadmaps and mid-long range strategic plans;

Past experience leading cross-functional teams to deliver goals and projects;

Demonstrated experience handing and maintaining confidential and sensitive information;

Demonstrated ability to create, modify and analyze documents and complex spreadsheets;

Strong knowledge of federal and provincial technology and privacy standards;

Track record of success leading a department with large levels of data inputs and outputs; and

Previous ERP implementation experience.


 





Competencies and Attributes:




Change Management:
 Demonstrated understanding and successful application of change management processes. Ability to communicate a vision and create buy-in to change.


Critical Thinking:
 Strong decision making, analytical and problem-solving skills.


Customer Focus:
 Creates positive working relationships both internally and externally. Continuously pays attention to customer needs adapting as they evolve. Builds strong customer relationships and delivers customer centric solutions.


Enterprise Level Thinking: 
Creates meaningful relationships to enhance understanding of overall business strategy and direction. Effectively identifies and articulates how innovation can support the achievement of PRIMED goals.


Excellent Communications Skills:
 Strong written and verbal skills with an ability to effectively communicate complex technical information to a variety of audiences.


Excellent Planning and Organizational skills
: Ability to develop, implement, and evaluate business plans and initiatives. A skilled time manager who can effectively multi-task, prioritize, remain composed under pressure and cultivate strong internal relationships.


Flexible:
 Pays attention to the circumstance and adjusts accordingly. Demonstrates ability to be agile and responsive to external factors impacting business success.


Innovative: 
Drives the IS portfolio forward, keeping up to date with system trends. Brings a creative approach to solving problems and models out of box thinking.


Leadership:
 Demonstrated ability to build and maintain relationships with a wide variety of individuals and groups. Ability to work collaboratively with colleagues and staff across the organization to create a results driven, team- oriented environment.


Project Management:
 Overseeing the design, development and implementation of new technology and processes.


Strategic Planning: 
Develops short and long-range plans that are comprehensive, creative, realistic and effective in meeting goals and objectives, and integrates planning efforts across functions.


Technical Evangelist: 
Expert level understanding of software development, infrastructure and data and the passion to advocate for its adoption.


Visionary: 
Ability to set and articulate a vision. Readily gains buy in to vision from team, peers, shareholders and stakeholders. Pursues a growth-oriented mindset that enables PRIMED to be a continue to be a leader in PPE.


 





Equal Opportunity


PRIMED Medical Products Inc. is committed to equity, diversity and inclusion and recognizes that a diverse team benefits and is essential to service excellence. PRIMED Medical Products Inc. welcomes applications from all qualified individuals and encourage women, members of racialized communities, Indigenous persons, persons with disabilities, and persons of any sexual orientation or gender identity to confidentially self-identify at time of application. In accordance with the provincial legislation, accommodation will be provided by Gallagher and PRIMED Medical Products Inc. throughout the recruitment, selection and/or assessment process, upon request, to applicants with disabilities. All qualified candidates are encouraged to apply.

job_title: BI Analytics Consultant- NetSuite Analytics Warehouse Advanced
description:
Senior Platform Functional Consultant -NetSuite (NetSuite Functional Consultant)






Brief Summary: 





The NetSuite Analytics Warehouse Advanced Customer Services team has the mission to guide and assist our customers by performing assessments, developing analytic reporting strategies and solutions, and supporting the life cycle of analytics solutions.

We are looking for an experienced consultant/developer with significant hands-on experience working with NetSuite SuiteAnalytics Connect, integration, ETL and data warehouse solutions to assist Oracle NetSuite’s clients with their data warehouse reporting needs. Knowledge of related solutions such as Oracle Analytics Cloud (OAC), NetSuite SuiteAnalytics Connect, Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW) and Oracle Fusion Analytics Warehouse (FAW) is greatly desired.





Key Responsibilities:



Gather customer requirements and collaborate with the customer to define the business challenge the customer is attempting to better understand with data

Taking the defined business objective, leveraging the understanding of the data model and producing analytics to provide actionable insights

Identify new data and product patterns through data mining and communicate those complex concepts and the results of the analyses in a clear and effective manner through creative visualization directly to company executives

Extend the current data warehouse by incorporating data from 3rd party datasets/applications

Build data pipelines from multiple data sources by performing necessary ETL tasks including processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis

Serve as a technical expert when implementing solutions.

Develop solutions that follow product development guidelines and are in-line with established design standards and approved architectures.

Transfer product knowledge to customers to reinforce training and ensure adoption.

Resolve or escalate client issues as appropriate to support and engineering teams.

Develop and maintain up-to-date knowledge of Oracle and NetSuite analytics, data integration products, and service offerings.

Work collaboratively with the NetSuite Product Team to influence design, product features, and roadmap.

Attend internal meetings and collaborate by sharing knowledge and best practices within the practice including mentoring sessions for junior resources, and other strategic initiatives.






Preferred Qualifications/Skills include:


At least 5 - 8 years of experience in OBIEE/Hyperion/Oracle Analytics Cloud, Data Warehouse, or SQL experience, ideally with integration to/from Oracle NetSuite Application


Solid understanding of Oracle Database, Data Modelling, Oracle SQL Developer, Data Warehouse concepts, advanced analytics concepts, and implementation.

Experience querying databases and using statistical computer languages: R, Python, SLQ, etc.

Experience with the following Oracle solutions is greatly desired: Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW), Oracle Analytics Cloud (OAC), NetSuite SuiteAnalytics Connect, Oracle Fusion Analytics Warehouse (FAW), JDBC/ODBC, ADO.net 

Able to perform complex problem solving and work collaboratively with NetSuite Support and Product Management

Experience with one or more of the following or similar business applications: NetSuite, SAP, Siebel, Oracle, QuickBooks, Great Plains, Salesforce.com, MAS 90, PeopleSoft, JD Edwards

Experience in data design, data modeling, data mapping, data interrogation, data quality, and master data management is desired

Strong interpersonal and communication skills

Experience architecting and provisioning/configuring cloud-based data warehouse and/or database solutions is desired



Travel



Modest to moderate, as appropriate. 





Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans status or any other characteristic protected by law.




At Oracle, we do not just value differences—we celebrate them. We are committed to creating a workplace where all kinds of people work together. We believe innovation starts with diversity and inclusion. https://www.oracle.com/corporate/careers/culture/diversity.html

Job description:


 
Req ID: 92810
 
Department: Information Services
 
Job Type: Full-Time
 
Position Type: Non-Union
 
Location: Calgary, Alberta
 
Country: Canada
 
% of Travel: 0-10%
 
# of Positions: 1
 
Job Grade: Level 4
 
Job Available to: Internal & External
 
Deadline to apply: 03/31/2022
 

 



Canadian Pacific is a transcontinental railway in Canada and the United States with direct links to major ports on the west and east coasts. CP provides North American customers a competitive rail service with access to key markets in every corner of the globe. CP is growing with its customers, offering a suite of freight transportation services, logistics solutions and supply chain expertise. Visit cpr.ca to see the rail advantages of CP. For more on our purpose, culture, and strategy, visit cpr.ca/en/about-cp.



 




PURPOSE OF POSITION:




This Specialist, Business Intelligence Developer will participate in developing business intelligence solutions that collect, analyze, and present information to the business, and subsequently develop the solution in Qlikview and Qlik Sense to address the business requirements. 



 



 
POSITION ACCOUNTABILITIES:




 
Assess system operations and implement Reporting solutions to optimize performance;
 
Responsible for defining and documenting business requirements;
 
Develop functional and technical specifications to meet business requirements;
 
Perform development to provide reporting solutions addressing specific business needs;
 
Responsible for root cause analysis on production issues;
 
Responsible for the implementation of solutions to resolve production defects;
 
Assess business requirements & processes and provide recommendations on optimal solutions that will best serve the business needs;
 
Provide end user support and training.
 
Support Reporting applications on 7/24 basis based on on-call roaster.
 

 




POSITION REQUIREMENTS:




 
University Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent Business Intelligence technical experience;
 
Knowledge of the Railway business is preferable but not mandatory;
 
6-8 years of hands on experience in Reporting tools with at least 3 end to end implementations
 
Minimum of 2-4 years’ Hands-on Experience with a Dashboard Tool like Qlikview or Qlik Sense
 
Minimum of 3-5 years’ of hand-on experience in SQL.
 
Strong experience in understanding of business users expectations;
 
Experienced in creating technical design documents from the functional specification documents;
 
Capability to provide high level and detail estimates;
 
Proven track record in designing and delivering complex Reporting solutions for large organizations;
 
Team player, skilled in working in a highly collaborative manner. 
 

 




WHAT CP HAS TO OFFER:




 
Flexible and competitive benefits package
 
Competitive company pension plan
 
Employee Share Purchase Plan
 
Performance Incentive Program 
 
Annual Fitness Subsidy
 

 




ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:




As an employer with national presence, the possibility does exist that the location of your position may be changed based on organizational requirements.



 




Background Investigation:




The successful candidate will need to successfully complete the following clearances:    



 
Criminal history check
 
Reference check
 

 




Management Conductor Program:




Becoming a qualified conductor or locomotive engineer is the single best way for a management employee to learn the business at CP. You may be required to obtain a certification or to maintain your current certification/qualification as a conductor or locomotive engineer.



 



CP is an equal opportunity employer committed to the principles of employment equity and inclusion. We welcome applications from all qualified individuals. All applicant information will be managed in accordance with the federal Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act ("PIPEDA").

Job Description



Business Intelligence Developer



Job Description
:


Business Intelligence Developer is responsible for detailed technical design, development, documentation of specifications, and support application users according to business units' requirements. 

Work closely with business and internal partners to understand strategic objectives, recommend and implement BI solutions.




Job Responsibilities
:


Business Intelligence Developer demonstrates the ability to lead projects (eg. Windows-based information management applications) from requirements to deployment with minimal supervision, to support overall business/function strategy in line with enterprise standards & policies.

Conduct ad-hoc data analysis and provide technical support and enhancements for applications that are consumed by business users.

Operate in a collaborative and cooperative environment, Agile POD, and must possess the strong interpersonal skills necessary to work effectively with colleagues at various levels of the organization

Prioritize and manage own workload to deliver quality results and meet assigned timelines

Ability to work and research/resolve issues independently while sharing best practices and knowledge with colleagues.

Excellent analytical skills and very strong relationship management skills.

Previous business banking or Credit product application development experience would be an asset




Must Haves
:


MS Access Application development - 5 yrs

VBA for form, chart, module, class, and automation - 5 yrs

PowerBI and DotNet - 5 years

Business intelligence Developer Experience - 5 years

Communication skills - Excellent




Nice to have
:


Banking experience

Lending product experience

Agile experience




Required Skills
:


Very good knowledge of VBA across MS office products (Access, Excel, Word, and Outlook)

Knowledge of creating Access report, Chart, form, module, class, and automation.

Knowledge to import/export data (CSV files) from/to Access using VBA

Knowledge of creating Excel Forms and automation using VBA.

Knowledge of creating word documents using MS word VBA.

Knowledge using API in VBA and Round-Robin algorithm in Access/Excel.

Create an email using Outlook VBA to read and write emails.

Writing high-performance SQL store-procedure, Views, triggers, and pivot in Access

Good knowledge of DB architects.

Knowledge using ODBC in Access Database to communicate between more than one Access DB file.

Knowledge of XML to customize and populate MS Access ribbon.

Good knowledge of creating batch files commands.



#tech

Job Description



Our Retail Analytics team helps retailers turn shopper insights into strategic advantage. We leverage our deep expertise in data science and technology to mine shopper data, uncovering what drives consumer decision making. By using advanced modeling, artificial intelligence and cloud-based SaaS solutions, we can put these insights at the fingertips of our clients.

As a BI Developer, you’ll be part of a team of smart, highly skilled engineers and data scientists who are proud to partner with some of the world’s leading retailers on challenging, cutting-edge, data driven solutions, powered by technology, and people. While your core skill will be BI Application development, you will be expected to contribute in all areas of the product by developing your skills in other technologies, such as data, web development, automated testing and infrastructure.

NIQ always ensures that its associates maintain a healthy work-life balance. NIQ puts its associates first – investing to develop their technical and soft skills. We learn together, deliver awesome products that we are proud of, and have fun. Our team is co-located and agile, with a central hub in Toronto.



What You’ll Do




Develop custom web reporting solutions for industry leading interactive retail analytics 

Work as part of a team to design, develop and deploy systems with configuration for different client data and business rules 

Develop Qlik Sense applications with focus on accuracy, data model efficiency and data relationships across reports 

Develop with system integration in mind, mainly in context of data flow into and from Qlik Sense (BI Reporting Tool) and integrate with web applications 

Continually develop technical expertise to ensure that customer solutions are efficient 

Consistently develop with performance in mind to optimize end user experience 

Work with architects and senior team members to identify new tools and technologies where applicable to expand customer offerings 

Research and take advantage of new technology to improve and expand solutions 

Participate in team innovation by exploring newest QlikSense versions and functionality, implementing in tools and presenting via formal knowledge sharing sessions 

Participate in peer code reviews, troubleshoot and correct software defects 

Work in an agile development environment, collaborating with web developers, testers and devops where you will be involved in scrum meetings, requirements discussion, technical design sessions, UAT process and other tasks related to iterative development 




We’re Looking For People Who Have




 1-3 years of development experience working with business data with exposure to ETL, data modeling and front-end UI design using industry leading BI tools (Qlik Sense, Qlikview, Sisense, Tableau, or PowerBI) 

Solid foundation of data visualization skills, design principles, dashboard, and scorecard design 

Solid database skills and can validate tools you build with direct database queries 

Ability to employ a design-first approach to coding and technical problem solving and dedicate time to unit testing and integration testing to achieve high quality standards 

College or university degree in Mathematics, Computer Science, Business, Information Systems (or equivalent combination of skill and experience) 




Additional Information



REF14549E



About NielsenIQ



NielsenIQ is a global measurement and data analytics company that provides the most complete and trusted view available of consumers and markets worldwide. We provide consumer packaged goods manufacturers/fast-moving consumer goods and retailers with accurate, actionable information and insights and a complete picture of the complex and changing marketplace that companies need to innovate and grow. Our approach marries proprietary NielsenIQ data with other data sources to help clients around the world understand what’s happening now, what’s happening next, and how to best act on this knowledge. We like to be in the middle of the action. That’s why you can find us at work in over 90 countries, covering more than 90% of the world’s population. For more information, visit 
www.niq.com.


NielsenIQ is committed to hiring and retaining a diverse workforce. We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action-Employer, making decisions without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability status, age, marital status, protected veteran status or any other protected class.

We are looking for a passionate developer in reporting, business intelligence and data visualization!

Reporting to the Manager, Application & Database Operations, the Business Intelligence Developer will support & enhance existing BI projects and participate in net-new initiatives to drive new capabilities while improving the enterprise capability in reporting and analytics.

The BI Developer has knowledge or experience implementing analytics solutions and common services such as Data Governance and Data Quality in hybrid data architectures (cloud and on-premise).This position will occasionally be called on to advise and support database applications such as system-to-system integrations or as an advisor to data migration / data cleansing efforts.



Responsibilities



Be a courageous safety leader, adhere to and sponsor safety and environmental rules and procedures

Participate in project planning sessions with multiple partners to analyze business requirements and outline the proposed solution

Develop technical specifications based on business requirements

Participate in design reviews, contribute to the design recommendations and incorporate the security requirements

Provide input to information data and flow

Understand and follow System Development Life Cycle methodology

Adhere to I/S control policies throughout design, development, and testing

Document the detailed application specifications

Translate technical specifications into application modules

Perform unit and integration testing



Qualifications



Computer Science degree or equivalent education and experience

Confirmed experience in building and deploying reports to either on-premise and/or cloud implementations of Power BI.

Excellent SQL skills for extracting data from relational databases and designing & implementing data marts using SSIS to extract, transform, and load (ETL)business-critical information into SQL Server databases from disparate sources

Hands-on experience building data analytical capabilities by using OLAP, SSIS, SSAS and Cubes

Deep level understanding in writing MDX / DAX for design and reporting purposes

Solid skills with the Microsoft technology stack (SSAS, SSRS, SQL Server, TSQL, MDX, DAX, Power BI, Power Pivot, Power Query)

Ability to create multi-dimensional and tabular models.

Creative and innovative problem-solver applying the best techniques that address data architecture, extraction, transformation, movement, storage, integration and governance of data.

Excellent verbal and written communication skills in both technical and non-technical scenarios.

Knowledge of or experience with ML enabled Data Management, Data Lakes and, IOT Integration and Analytics projects considered an asset.

Successful candidates must be fully vaccinated against infection by COVID-19. Candidates who are unable to be vaccinated due to a personal characteristic protected under applicable human rights legislation may request to be exempt from this requirement. We will do our best to accommodate those who are unable to be vaccinated.



About Teck



At Teck, we value diversity. Our teams work collaboratively and respect each person's unique perspective and contribution.

We wish to thank all applicants for their interest and effort in applying for the position; however, only candidates selected for interviews will be contacted.

Teck is a diversified resource company committed to responsible mining and mineral development with major business units focused on copper, steelmaking coal, zinc and energy. Headquartered in Vancouver, Canada, its shares are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange under the symbols TECK.A and TECK.B and the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol TECK.

The pursuit of sustainability guides Teck's approach to business. Teck is building partnerships and capacity to confront sustainability challenges within the regions in which it operates and at the global level. In 2018, Teck was named to the Dow Jones Sustainability World Index (DJSI) for the ninth straight year, indicating that Teck's sustainability practices rank in the top 10 per cent of the world's 2,500 largest public companies in the S&P Global Broad Market Index.

Learn more about Teck at www.teck.com or follow @TeckResources

Your application to this posting is deemed to be your consent to the collection, use and necessary disclosure of personal information for the purposes of recruitment. Teck respects the privacy of all applicants and the confidentiality of personal information.

Job Segment: Business Intelligence, Computer Science, Data Management, Database, Technology, Mining, Data

industries: Marketing Services, Software Development, and Internet Publishing
description:
Our mission is to bring community and belonging to everyone in the world. Reddit is a community of communities where people can dive into anything through experiences built around their interests, hobbies, and passions. With more than 50 million people visiting 100,000+ communities daily, it is home to the most open and authentic conversations on the internet. From pets to parenting, skincare to stocks, there’s a community for everybody on Reddit. For more information, visit redditinc.com.

"The front page of the internet,” Reddit brings over 430 million people together each month through their common interests, inviting them to share, vote, comment, and create across thousands of communities. Come for the cats, stay for the empathy.

As a data warehouse engineer, you will build scalable tools on top of Reddit's petabyte-scale warehouse to support all data customers of Reddit. Your work will enable data scientists, machine learning engineers, and product teams to create and access data at a massive scale. If you have a passion for building and maintaining high quality data tools, and want to improve how Reddit makes strategic decisions at the company level, then this is the team for you!



What You’ll Learn




You will be exposed to the full lifecycle of data at Reddit, and as a result will gain expertise on how to scale and improve the data culture across the entire company

You will work directly with a diverse team set including data science, experimentation, infrastructure, machine learning, and senior leadership

You will work with one of the largest and richest datasets in the world, and get exposure to leading data technologies (including the ones Reddit builds from the ground up)





What You’ll Do




Build and scale data orchestration services that support complex analysis across Reddit

Consistently evolve data model & data schema based on business and engineering requirements

Own data quality for crucial systems at Reddit, and serve as a primary resource for data expertise

Define and manage SLA for datasets that support production services





Who You Might Be




3+ years experience in the data warehouse space

3+ years experience working with large scale ETL systems (implementation, strategy, and maintenance)

3+ years of experience building clean, maintainable, and well-tested code

Fluent in Python and SQL

Excellent communication skills to collaborate with stakeholders at all levels of the company

Bonus points for background in data science, analytics, or data QA




Reddit is committed to providing reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities and disabled veterans in our job application procedures. If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, please contact us at 

ApplicationAssistance@Reddit.com

.

We’re building a movement - an education revolution
. We’re building a world where anyone, anywhere can have access to the best education regardless of where they were born. At our core, we believe education is a right, not a privilege. To that end, we’re building a company and a suite of products to lead the charge in transforming access to education.

ApplyBoard is an online platform that empowers students around the world to access the best education by connecting international students, recruitment partners, and academic institutions. We simplify the study abroad search, application, and acceptance process. Not only do we help students with their study abroad journey, but we also help academic institutions to find the best students globally. Our goal is to help enable better, more diverse, schools that are enriched with cultures from all over the world.


The Role:


ApplyBoard is looking for a 
Data Scientist
 that values collaboration and nurtures innovation while working in an energetic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in statistics, data science, and/or pattern recognition who will be valuable to organize, interpret and transform large datasets into actionable intelligence. In this role, it is expected to use best practices to identify data-driven opportunities for innovation, build analytics


Responsibilities:



Guide big data and small data strategies to interpret and predict human behaviour 

Work with an innovative team to shape the future using objective data-driven decisions 

Identify and qualify new data sources, techniques, and datasets to enhance insight 

Facilitate and support the use of sound analytical practices across the organization 

Analyze large, raw, and potentially noisy datasets to derive actionable intelligence 

Interpret relevant insights from diverse datasets including time-series data 

Validate results using best practices in math and statistics 

Visualize and present insights and models clearly and effectively to diverse audiences 




Preferred Qualifications:



Degree in mathematics, statistics, engineering, computer science, finance, or similar (Masters or PhD desired) 

Demonstrated ability to learn, adapt, and solve tough problems 

Strong analytical skills, strong model and software development skills and an open mind 

Experience and passion for applying statistical and data mining techniques to overcome real world challenges - deriving intelligence from data 

Experience writing complete, clear, and concise designs, data models, and algorithms 

Highly proficient at disseminating complex technical concepts in both written and oral forms with the ability to communicate this across all levels of the business 

Experience building data-driven software solutions with Python 

Experience working with statistical software 

Experience with multiple data management tools ( HDFS, PostGIS, MapReduce, Spark ) 

Experience with visualization tools ( Plot.ly/Dash, Tableau, Pentaho, PowerBI) 

Driven, passionate and creative, and thrives in a fast-paced environment 




What We Offer: 


The opportunity to have an impact on a product that is positively affecting change to thousands of students lives every day

Working alongside a brilliant and globally diverse team based in Waterloo and Toronto

Great compensation and benefits package to keep you healthy and happy!

Thank you for your interest in ApplyBoard, however, only those applicants that have been selected for an interview will be contacted.

At ApplyBoard, we understand the value of having a diverse team. That’s why we believe in providing equal opportunity regardless of race, national or ethnic origin, colour, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, family status, genetic characteristics, disability, and conviction. Please let us know if you require accommodation during the recruitment process.


Life at ApplyBoard:


By joining our team, you have the opportunity to:

Join the fastest-growing technology company in Canada, with many opportunities for growth and advancement

Work alongside a globally diverse team of over 
1,600 team members based in 18 countries, who represent over 30 nationalities and speak more than 40 languages


Make a difference in the lives of thousands of students as they explore educational opportunities

Want to learn more about Life at ApplyBoard, and be sure to follow us on our Life at ApplyBoard Instagram.


About ApplyBoard: 


ApplyBoard empowers students around the world to access the best education by simplifying the study abroad search, application, and acceptance process to more than 
1,500 institutions
 across Canada, Australia, the United States, and the United Kingdom. ApplyBoard, headquartered in Kitchener, Ontario, Canada, has
 helped more than 200,000 students from more than 125 countries 
along their educational journeys since 2015.

ApplyBoard was named the fastest-growing technology company in Canada by Deloitte,
 ranking #1 on the Technology Fast 50™
 list in 2019 and #2 in 2020. ApplyBoard was also been named to LinkedIn’s list of Top Startups in 2020 and TechTO’s list of top Canadian Rocketship companies to accelerate your career in the Tech Industry.

In 2021, ApplyBoard announced a C$375M Series D funding on a 
C$4B valuation.
 This funding will allow us to further invest in our technology, grow our team around the world, and serve more students on our mission to educate the world. Thank you for your interest in ApplyBoard. Please note that only qualified applicants that have been selected for an interview will be contacted.

Passionné.e de la donnée mais prisonnier.ère de ton quotidien?


Tu es passionné.e d'ETL, fan d’entrepôt de données, enthousiaste de l’expérience client et de la dynamique d’équipe et tu aimes la diversité dans tes mandats? Libère-toi et joins-toi à notre équipe comme développeur BI. Partenaire Gold Microsoft (certification Data Analytics), nous ne faisons que du BI depuis 30 ans et nous avons une diversité de clients qui garantit que tu ne t’ennuieras jamais au sein de notre équipe d’experts!





Tu as les clés pour t’évader, si tu excelles à



effectuer l’analyse des composants à développer à partir de l’analyse d’affaires effectuée et de l’architecture

développer des packages SSIS, écrire du code pour la tâche de script et la gestion des erreurs, gérer les processus de déploiement

écrire des requêtes SQL moyennement complexe à complexe

créer et planifier des jobs avec l’agent SQL Server

analyser et optimiser la performance SQL des différentes requêtes qui accèdent aux bases de données

écrire la documentation technique sur les composants développés

monitorer et au besoin reprendre les processus de chargement de données en partageant cette tâche avec les autres développeurs ETL






Tu peux retrouver ta liberté si



tu as le sens du service à la clientèle

tu es autonome

tu respectes tes engagements

tu as une bonne capacité d’analyse

tu as un esprit d’équipe

tu aimes bâtir sur le long terme

tu aimes apprendre

tu communiques facilement

tu aimes la diversité et le changement dans ton quotidien






Syntell en deux mots


Nous sommes une équipe de passionnés de la donnée et de nos clients! Nous livrons des produits et des services de grande qualité, tout en cherchant à garantir un avenir meilleur pour notre équipe. La collaboration entre tous les membres de notre équipe favorise le développement du plein potentiel de chacun. Notre organisation privilégie une gestion ouverte, participative et basée sur la confiance et où l’atteinte des résultats se fait par le travail d’équipe et la coopération.





Compétences recherchées






Compétences générales
 :


DEC en informatique ou autre formation pertinente

3 à 5 ans d’expérience dans le rôle de développeur ETL






Compétences techniques :



Maîtrise du langage SQL et des bases de données SQL Server (MS SQL Server 2016/2019)

Expérience dans l’analyse de performance et dans l’optimisation de requêtes SQL et dans le design de cube

Forte connaissance d’ETL, SSIS, SSAS, SSRS (SQL Server Integration/Reporting Services)

Expérience de programmation avec des langages MDXConnaissance de Team Foundation Version Control (TFVC)

Connaissance de l’approche « Kimball » ou « Data Vault » (atout)

Connaissance de C#/VB/PowerShell (atout)

Connaissance des BD Microsoft Azure (atout)

Expérience en analyse d'affaires (atout)

Connaissance de Power BI (atout)






Avantages sociaux



Rémunération compétitive

Horaire flexible

Remboursement d'activités de formation et perfectionnement

Assurance des frais médicaux et paramédicaux, assurance vie et invalidité longue durée et compte santé

Télétravail





Le succès de notre organisation repose sur l’énorme talent et la complémentarité de notre équipe. Nous avons confiance qu’ensemble, nous pouvons tout accomplir. C’est pourquoi le bien-être de nos collègues ainsi que leur développement font partie de nos priorités.

Si tu es enthousiaste et passionné.e de ton domaine d’expertise, nous serons enchantés de recevoir ta candidature. 


Fais-nous parvenir ton CV dès aujourd’hui à : emplois@syntell.com



Nous te remercions de ton intérêt!

Creating visualizations for the data extracted with the help of Tableau.

Tableau development experience

Snowflakes, Marketing and SFDC knowledge is a plus

Identifying patterns and meaningful insights from data by analyzing it

Designing dashboards

Managing Tableau Server

Managing big data

Twisting SQL queries for improving performances

Finding the key areas of automation to make the business processes smooth

Developing reference documents or reports for the finalized project

job_title: Développeur intelligence d'affaires et Big data / Business Intelligence and Big Data Developer
description:
Qui sommes-nous? : 


Chez Pratt & Whitney, nous croyons que le vol motorisé a transformé, et continuera de transformer, le monde. C'est pourquoi nous travaillons avec un cœur d'explorateur et un acharnement de perfectionniste à concevoir, produire et entretenir les moteurs d'avion les plus avancés et les plus fiables du monde. Notre portefeuille diversifié - composé de moteurs commerciaux et militaires ainsi que de moteurs destinés à l'aviation d'affaires, générale et régionale, et aux hélicoptères – nous permet, ainsi qu’à nos clients, de passer du possible au réel. C'est ainsi que, chez Pratt & Whitney, nous abordons notre travail et ce qui nous inspire à nous dépasser.





Description de la fonction: 


Le développeur d’intelligence d’affaires et Big Data travaillera avec l'équipe analytique et gestion des données de l'organisation Logistique Globale & Planification d'activité intégrée. Le candidat sera responsable du développement, de la maintenance et l’assistance aux outils d'analyse de données (bases de données SQL Server et procédures stockées, rapports Power BI, algorithmes d'apprentissage machine, etc.) pour soutenir les processus de logistique d'entreprise. Le candidat travaillera avec l’analyste en intelligence d’affaires et de la chaîne d'approvisionnement pour remodeler les outils existants et créer la nouvelle génération d'outils d'analyse numérique dans SQL Server, Big Data Hadoop et Cloud (Azure et AWS). De plus, le candidat doit collaborer avec les différentes équipes de l'organisation de technologies numériques pour assurer la qualité des données et la viabilité des ETL dans les systèmes d’entrepôts de données de l'organisation Logistique Globale & Planification d'activité intégrée. (SQL Server DataMart et Hadoop DataLake).





Énoncés de responsabilité: 



Automatisation de la transformation et intégration de données

Faire la conception, programmation, contrôle et documentation des ETLs, base de données, rapports, OLAP et outils analytiques

Développer des requêtes complexes SQL dans l’environnement SQL Server, HIVE et SPark

Effectuer de la programmation Python avancée

Produire une programmation de haute qualité qui est durable et bien documentée

Travailler en collaboration avec l’analyste de la chaîne d'approvisionnement et d’intelligence d’affaires afin de mettre en place des outils analytiques et Big Data

Exécution et documentation des tests d’approbation d’utilisateur

Créer et maintenir la documentation du design conceptuel et le code généré

Travailler avec différentes équipes technologies numériques afin d’assurer l’intégrité des données

Assister le développement et la maintenance de rapport Power BI

Fournir une assistance technique à l’analyste Intelligence d’Affaires et Chaîne d’Approvisionnement






Qualifications requises: 



Baccalauréat avec 3 ans d’expérience dans un rôle similaire.

Certificat en intelligence d’affaires et Big Data (atout majeur)

Forte expérience dans la conception et l’utilisation d’outils Microsoft Business Intelligence (T-SQL, SQL Server, SSIS, SSAS, Power BI), Big Data (HDFS, Hive, Spark, SQOOP, etc.) et Cloud (Azure et AWS)

Expérience avec SAP et données de chaîne approvisionnement (atout majeur)

Forte communication et auto-motivation pour travailler avec des données complexes de chaine approvisionnement;

Solides compétences en matière d'analyse et de résolution de problèmes

Compétences en gestion de projet (approche agile)

Bilingue, doit parler couramment l'anglais (oral et écrit)






Ce qui vous attend 



Programme de congé à rémunération différée

Garderie pour jeunes enfants

Programmes d’avancement professionnel et de scolarisation

Horaires flexibles

Programmes et formations sur le leadership

Gamme d’avantages sociaux, régime d’épargne et régime de retraite

Programme d’aide de financement pour les congés parentaux

Programme de reconnaissance et de récompense






Diversité et inclusion: 


Le générique masculin est utilisé sans discrimination et uniquement dans le but d'alléger le texte. P&WC souscrit au principe de l’équité en matière d’emploi et est déterminé à encourager la diversité et l’inclusion. Nous sommes heureux d’étudier la demande d’emploi de tous les candidats qualifiés, sans égard à leur race, couleur, religion, orientation sexuelle, genre, nationalité d’origine, âge, handicap, statut d’ancien combattant ou tout autre statut protégé par la loi.





English version 






Who we are:


At Pratt & Whitney, we believe that powered flight has transformed – and will continue to transform – the world. That’s why we work with an explorer’s heart and a perfectionist’s grit to design, build, and service the world’s most advanced aircraft engines. We do this across a diverse portfolio – including Commercial Engines, Military Engines, Business Aviation, General Aviation, Regional Aviation, and Helicopter Aviation – and as a way of turning possibilities into realities for our customers. This is how we at Pratt & Whitney approach our work, and this is why we are inspired to go beyond.





Function Description: 


The Business Intelligence and Big Data developer will work with the Analytics & Data Management team in Global Logistics and Integrated Business Planning organization. The candidate will be responsible to develop, maintain and sustain data analytics tools (SQL Server databases and stored procedures, Power BI reports, Machine Learning algorithms, etc.) to support Enterprise Logistics processes. The candidate will work with the Supply Chain Analytics Scientist to revamp the existing tools and to build the new generation of the digital analytics tools in SQL Server, Big Data Hadoop and Cloud (Azure and AWS). Also, the candidate has to collaborate with the different teams in the Digital Technology organization to ensure the data quality and sustainability of the ETLs in the Global Logistics Data Warehouse systems (SQL Server DataMart and Hadoop DataLake).





Responsibility Statements: 



Automate data integration and transformation

Design, code, test and document ETLs, databases, reports, OLAP and analytics tools

Develop complex SQL queries in SQL Server, Hive and Spark

Perform advanced Python programming

Deliver high quality codes that are maintainable and well documented

Work with the Supply Chain Analytics Scientist to deploy the new Analytics and Big Data tools

Conduct and document User Acceptance Tests

Create and maintain the documentation of the logical design and codes produced

Work with the different IT teams to ensure data quality

Support the development and maintenance of Power BI reports

Provide technical assistance to the Global Logistics Business Intelligence analysts






Qualifications required:



Bachelor’s degree with over 3 years' experience in a similar role

Certification in Business Intelligence and Big Data (strong asset)

Strong experience with design and use of Microsoft Business Intelligence tools (T-SQL, SQL Server, SSIS, SSAS, Power BI), Big Data (HDFS, Hive, Spark, SQOOP, etc.) and Cloud (Azure and AWS)

Experience with SAP and Supply Chain data (strong asset)

Strong communication and self-motivation to work with complex supply chain data

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

Project Management skills (agile approach)

Bilingual, must be fluent in English (oral and written)


Field of studies:
 Computer Science, Data Engineering, Data Science, Information Technology, Software Engineering,






What we offer:



Long-term deferred compensation programs

Daycare for young children

Advancement programs to enhance education skills

Flexible work schedules

Leadership and training programs

Comprehensive benefits, savings and pension plans

Financial support for parental leave

Reward programs for outstanding work






Diversity and inclusion: 


The masculine pronoun is used without discrimination and solely for the purpose of making the text easier to read. P&WC is an equal opportunities employer, seeking to promote diversity and inclusion. We will consider applications from all qualified candidates, regardless of their race, colour, religion, sexual orientation, gender, nationality, age, disability, veteran status or any other status protected by law.

industries: IT Services and IT Consulting and Banking
description:
One of our banking client is looking for BI developer 
 



Duration -6+ months contract



Location - GTA


SUMMARY OF DAY-TO-DAY RESPONSIBILITIES:

 Responsible for detailed technical design, development, documentation of specifications and support application users according to business units requirements. Work closely with business and internal partners to understand strategic objectives, recommend and implement BI solutions.

 

 • Demonstrate the ability to lead projects (eg. Windows-based information management applications) from requirements to deployment with minimal supervision, to support of overall business/function strategy in line with enterprise standards & policies.

 • Conduct ad-hoc data analysis and provide technical support and enhancements for applications that are consumed by business users.

 • Operate in a collaborative and cooperative environment, client Agile POD, and must possess the strong interpersonal skills necessary to work effectively with colleagues at various levels of the organization

 • Prioritize and manage own workload to deliver quality results and meet assigned timelines

 • Ability to work and research/resolve issues independently while sharing best practices and knowledge with colleagues.

 • Excellent analytical skills and very strong relationship management skills.

 • Previous business banking or Credit product application development experience would be an asset

 

 Must Have:

 .) MS Access Application development – 5 yrs

 2.) VBA for form, chart, module, class, and automation – 5 yrs

 Power BI and DotNet – 5 years

 Business intelligence Developer Experience – 5 years

 Communication skills – Excellent

 

 Nice to have:

 2.) Banking experience

 3.) Lending product experience

 Agile experience

We are looking for a passionate developer in reporting, business intelligence and data visualization!

Reporting to the Manager, Application & Database Operations, the Senior Business Intelligence Developer will support & enhance existing BI projects and participate in net-new initiatives to drive new capabilities while improving the enterprise capability in reporting and analytics.

The Senior BI Developer has knowledge or experience implementing analytics solutions and common services such as Data Governance and Data Quality in hybrid data architectures (cloud and on-premise).This position will occasionally be called on to advise and support database applications such as system-to-system integrations or as an advisor to data migration / data cleansing efforts.



Responsibilities



Be a courageous safety leader, adhere to and sponsor safety and environmental rules and procedures

Participate in project planning sessions with multiple partners to analyze business requirements and outline the proposed solution

Develop technical specifications based on business requirements

Participate in design reviews, contribute to the design recommendations and incorporate the security requirements

Provide input to information data and flow

Understand and follow System Development Life Cycle methodology

Adhere to I/S control policies throughout design, development, and testing

Document the detailed application specifications

Translate technical specifications into application modules

Perform unit and integration testing



Qualifications



Computer Science degree or equivalent education and experience

Confirmed experience in building and deploying reports to either on-premise and/or cloud implementations of Power BI.

Excellent SQL skills for extracting data from relational databases and designing & implementing data marts using SSIS to extract, transform, and load (ETL)business-critical information into SQL Server databases from disparate sources

Hands-on experience building data analytical capabilities by using OLAP, SSIS, SSAS and Cubes

Deep level understanding in writing MDX / DAX for design and reporting purposes

Solid skills with the Microsoft technology stack (SSAS, SSRS, SQL Server, TSQL, MDX, DAX, Power BI, Power Pivot, Power Query)

Ability to create multi-dimensional and tabular models.

Creative and innovative problem-solver applying the best techniques that address data architecture, extraction, transformation, movement, storage, integration and governance of data.

Excellent verbal and written communication skills in both technical and non-technical scenarios.

Knowledge of or experience with ML enabled Data Management, Data Lakes and, IOT Integration and Analytics projects considered an asset.

Successful candidates must be fully vaccinated against infection by COVID-19. Candidates who are unable to be vaccinated due to a personal characteristic protected under applicable human rights legislation may request to be exempt from this requirement. We will do our best to accommodate those who are unable to be vaccinated.



About Teck



At Teck, we value diversity. Our teams work collaboratively and respect each person's unique perspective and contribution.

We wish to thank all applicants for their interest and effort in applying for the position; however, only candidates selected for interviews will be contacted.

Teck is a diversified resource company committed to responsible mining and mineral development with major business units focused on copper, steelmaking coal, zinc and energy. Headquartered in Vancouver, Canada, its shares are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange under the symbols TECK.A and TECK.B and the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol TECK.

The pursuit of sustainability guides Teck's approach to business. Teck is building partnerships and capacity to confront sustainability challenges within the regions in which it operates and at the global level. In 2018, Teck was named to the Dow Jones Sustainability World Index (DJSI) for the ninth straight year, indicating that Teck's sustainability practices rank in the top 10 per cent of the world's 2,500 largest public companies in the S&P Global Broad Market Index.

Learn more about Teck at www.teck.com or follow @TeckResources

Your application to this posting is deemed to be your consent to the collection, use and necessary disclosure of personal information for the purposes of recruitment. Teck respects the privacy of all applicants and the confidentiality of personal information.

Job Segment: Business Intelligence, Computer Science, Data Management, Database, Technology, Mining, Data

Requisition ID: 1870 

Department: Innovative Client Services Department 

Service: Information Technology Services 

Branch: Technology Modernization Branch

Employment Type: 1 Full-time Temporary - Up to 1 year 

Work Hours: 35.00 /hours per week

Affiliation: CIPP 

Salary Information: $82,815.46 - $100,775.22  annually (2019 rates of pay)

Location: 100 Constellation Drive 

City: Ottawa, ON

Job Category: Information Technology 

Application Close: 22/03/2022


Job Summary


The mandate of Information Technology Services is to create business value by providing innovative and strategic technology solutions for the business operations of the City of Ottawa.

With a focus on Business Intelligence Reporting you are responsible for: developing Business Intelligence & analytics reports, data visualizations; including data modeling and transformations , leading Analytics / ETL activities for large scale projects; actively participate in establishing and sustaining the Enterprise Data Management capabilities; researching, architecting, designing, developing, customizing, enhancing and/or integrating large-scale applications/solutions for assigned clients in response to new or changing business requirements and/or for assigned projects; maintaining these applications/solutions; and providing client technical support.

You are also responsible for: writing and maintaining systems documentation; ensuring all code is managed appropriately by using software configuration management tools; following the approved project lifecycle (PLC), as appropriate; ensuring solutions are made bilingual and comply with the Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act (AODA) Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0 AA (WCAG 2.0 AA); mentoring/coaching of other developers; and performing tests on enhancements / new development.


Education And Experience


Completion of 3 year university degree or college diploma in information management, information technology, or related field

Minimum of 5 years of progressively more responsible experience in development and/or integration, including experience with: Business Intelligence tools like PowerBI using variety of data sources, Cognos Analytics, SAP Analytics, PowerBI administration, Data Gateways; designing and building dataflows; Dimensional data modeling and ETL using Dataflows; providing technical support and guidance through prototyping, testing, build, and launching Power BI products; and Power BI integration with datwarehousing tool BW4HANA.

Strong experience with Geo Analytics capabilities, integration with ESRI ArcGIS.



KNOWLEDGE




Application development best practices

IT security best practices and standards relating to application development and/or integration

In-depth knowledge of the current City of Ottawa development toolset

Event-driven/object-oriented program design techniques

Structured systems analyses and design techniques

City network environment

Understanding of database concepts relating to application and database security

System testing techniques

Knowledge of and experience with COTS system installation, configuration, administration and support

A combination of knowledge and experience working with Oracle, .Net and/or Java development tool sets

Troubleshooting application issues

Good understanding of system failover and recovery strategies

Applicable legislation (e.g. MFIPPA, AODA) For Business Intelligence (BI) positions:

For Business Intelligence (BI) positions:

 Business intelligence tools and reporting with Cognos Analytics, PowerBI and SAC (SAP Analytics Cloud)

 PowerBI administration, Data Gateways

 Ingesting data from a variety of corporate data sources and performing required transformations in the Power BI query editor using a mixture of utilizing the UI and writing M code, DAX code.

 Dimensional data modeling and ETL using Dataflows

 Designing and building data flows including Transformations and Data Sources

 Knowledge of Geo Analytics capabilities, integration with ESRI ArcGIS

 Knowledge of Data Governance platform, integration with PowerBI for data lineage





Competencies, Skills And Abilities



Develop applications using current development toolset

Install, customize and configure COTS applications

Integrate hardware and software

Liaise effectively with clients, all levels of ITS staff, vendors and consultants

Gather and document user requirements

Organize work and meet deadlines

Demonstrate effective written and oral communication skills

Work independently and as a team member

Use effective judgment when immediate supervision is unavailable

Research and analytical skills

Good oral and written communication skills

Mentor junior staff (where applicable) Organize, develop and document procedures

Good organization and prioritization skills to handle multi-tasking

Enterprise scale application deployments

Development techniques for optimal performance and scalability

Collaborative approach in working with others

Converse effectively using both technical and general business terminology

Diplomacy and tact

Demonstrate initiative and self-motivation

Work effectively under pressure

Work with minimum supervision

Flexible

Able to meet deadlines

Client-focussed and service-oriented

High degree of interpersonal skills





What You Need To Know



Language Requirement: English oral, reading, writing 

Experience and formal training combined with demonstrated performance and ability may substitute for stipulated academic requirements.

description:
The successful candidate will be responsible for working with the business on their requests and building BI solutions using a mix of Microsoft stack (SSIS, SSRS). They will join the BI and Reporting team while migrating our core application to expand our current capabilities and keep consistency for our customers. The Migration creates a new source of record, and the BI developer will support both the internal data integrations as well as the DataMart supporting client facing reports in that transition.





PLEASE NOTE: THIS ROLE IS HYBRID FROM BC





Key responsibilities and accountabilities:

• Work as ETL developer with SSIS to maintain and expand DataMart and integrations

• Write extensive, elegant and performance effective Stored Procedures and SQL queries in SQL Server

• Performs data analysis and report development activities, such as the creation of SQL queries and stored procedures to extract data for reports.

• Assists in the training, support, maintenance, and ongoing administration of reporting system Qualifications

• 4+ years of working experience with MS SQL Server, SSIS, MySQL, GitHub

• Excellent data modelling skills

• Can communicate in both technical and business terms

• Education: Degree in Computer Science or Information Technology is preferred.

• Experience in Azure Data Factory is a plus.

description:

Contract - Toronto 




Must Have




 Expert in Microsoft Power BI design and development with proven successful project delivery.

 Agile methodology.

About Bevertec



For 35 plus years Bevertec has been at the forefront of providing top level technology professionals to our clients across the Greater Toronto Hamilton Area, Canada and beyond. Bevertec specializes in technology professionals but looks to fill all professional roles that help expand and grow our client’s business and advance our candidates careers.

Remaining at the forefront of providing staffing solutions has been no easy task for us, that why we depend on top caliber candidates like yourself and our team of business development managers to provide you with the opportunities to work with leaders within the IT realm to meet your aspirations. As proof of our continued success Bevertec places candidates with leaders in the public and private sector and continuous remains a vender of record with large organizations across the country.

Learn more at www.bevertec.com
